content:
The video is Shahheda's hit a few tens of meters from police officers, rescuers and doctors who assisted the victims as a result of the preliminary hit of another Shahaneda in civilian objects and dwellings.

Videoplaced on the evening of March 23National Police of Ukraine.

According to her, police and a rescuer were injured as a result of repeated blow.


"The enemy constantly uses the tactics of" double blows "aimed at killing people who arrived at the place of the first explosion to assist. Civilian, rescuers, physicians and police are the first victims of the second "arrival". It is the most cynical tactics worked by the enemy in many corners of the world, ”the National Police said.

AsThe ArmyInform reported earlierShakhi was hit by Kharkiv.
title: Police showed the moment of repeated shock "Shahaneda"
description: The video was posted on the evening of March 23 by the National Police of Ukraine. According to her, ...
author: Army Inform
